item.title: ::duel command messed up
item.dc:creator: @souleroo souleroo
item.description:
@souleroo wrote:

My ::duel command is messed up. This is how it looks like:

if(command.startsWith("duel") && playerRights > 0){ showInterface(6575); for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) duelEquipment(playerEquipment[i], playerEquipmentN[i], i); }

I Dont know if there is any other code, But in game when i do the ::Duel command it opens the interface of dueling options but i have no idea how to use it or even if it works.
I got my other friend to do the command same time as i did too and both accept but nothing happend.

Any Help?

Read full topic
